website_summaries.verdict: A premium 12-cup percolator that makes an excellent hot cup of coffee at a high volume in little time.
pros: Coffee comes out hot with bold, intensified flavor – never watered down
Makes coffee at 1-cup a minute, so a little over 10 minutes to make a full pot
Automatic “keep warm” mode to gently keep coffee warm
Well liked for its stainless steel components – no internal plastic parts and no paper filters required
Reviewers prefer the quality of coffee this makes over drip machines
cons: A percentage of these percolators last less than a year
Complaints that not coffee is not made as well as earlier models

customer_reviews.title: Farberware has messed up!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 12 cup Faberware coffee in April 2018. Almost 7 months later we are throwing it away. Our coffee has recently appeared weaker, of course we thought we must have miscalculated, in the amount of coffee we used. Guess not! Today it stopped working. Our family has always raved about the great cup of hot coffee we served, using a Farberware perculator. Have use Farberware perculators for years, the quality of the perculator is NOT what it used to be. Very disappointed customer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Naughton

customer_reviews.title: FarberwAre percolator no longer brews after less than 60 days
customer_reviews.text: I had an electric farberwAre percolator for more than ten years. It made the best and hottest coffee! It recently died, so I ordered a new one which was shipped on April 19. I could tell right away it was not of the same quality, lighter with cheaper metal. As of June 13 it is no longer working, but I my return date to Amazon expired May 19. Amazon should facilitate replacement from the manufacturer especially for long time prime customers. I will never buy another FarberwAre. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Left me high and dry after one use!
customer_reviews.text: Oh Faberware! Out of all the products I have purchased on Amazon in the last 8 years, I was probably most looking forward to this one. Unfortunately, it stopped working after it made 1 pot of coffee. Yes, today, Monday morning, it refused to do anything for me when I plugged it in. I tried a different cable, a different outlet, still nothing. I'm not about to try anything else since it is brand spanking new. Seller was great; I received product before expected, but Faberware is a different story. Too bad. I love percolated coffee, but the life of of their pots has gotten worse and worse.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: ... food comes in contact with and I am in love with this pot
customer_reviews.text: I switched to the old fashioned way of brewing my morning coffee to try and eliminate some of the plastic my food comes in contact with and I am in love with this pot. Inside is stainless steel. The coffee comes out much hotter than my drip coffeemaker. The markings on the inside of the pot to indicate the water level are a little hard to read, would probably get an upgrade with the see through window on the outside. But overall, I love it! Love the old fashioned swoosh swoosh sound it makes.
customer_reviews.author: Buff C. Barr

customer_reviews.title: The percolator died after 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: I usually am happy with my purchase of the Farberware percolator. I can get use of the percolator for at least 4-5 years. It's disappointing this new one couldn't last two months. January was the last time I could return this item. I will try to contact Faberware to see if they will send me a new one and if I can return this one to them. They just don't make quality goods anymore.
customer_reviews.author: RI shopper

customer_reviews.title: Short life for this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: It lasted 8 months, then quit working. It no longer perks. It runs through the cycle and then you just have hot water. I liked it when it worked. I read reviews prior to purchasing, and the reviews told me it wouldn't last long, but I wanted to try it. Sorry I spent the money. I'm looking again for a good, reliable coffee maker that is not ridiculously expensive.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Farberware is no longer a quality percolator.
customer_reviews.text: Our 6th Farberware percolator. The last three never lasted more than two months before the heating element went nad. The last one never got hotter than tepid and did not produce a single good pot of coffee. The only reason I gave it one star is because I was able to easily return it and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: H C Duke Boutwell

customer_reviews.title: So far I’m a happy buyer. The coffee tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of the constant maintenance and cost of single brew coffee maker. When we decided to get a percolater I chose this brand because we had one years ago and it was a reliable unit. So far I’m a happy buyer. The coffee tastes great. Wait time for brewing isn’t that long and one brewing of 12 cups is the perfect amount for our morning wake me up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the perk!
customer_reviews.text: So I'm getting a little older I would appreciate a larger cup measurement stamp on the interior so is easier to see fill line. All that said, I love the coffee this brews!! Daily routine and it's a great perk
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L

customer_reviews.title: not as good. On the bottom are little feet which makes ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had several Farberware percolators over the years....the product quality has seemed to change, not as good. On the bottom are little feet which makes the unit sit unstable and it when brewing makes odds sounds. The one pictured says quick brew the one I received does not have that notation.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Spitz

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: Fast and works well. Compared to drip coffee it’s not the best
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M

customer_reviews.title: Short Life Span.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Farberware Percolator. Problem is that if you use it every day, the thermocouple fails after about a year and the coffee is weak and luke warm.
customer_reviews.author: Bladerunner

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasts!
customer_reviews.text: This pot makes great coffee. It comes out hotter than drip makers. However, after a couple of months of daily use, it now started percolating after an hour of being plugged in. This has never ever happened to any of my other Farberware electric percolators. I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: The cover may slip off while pouring
customer_reviews.text: The pot makes a great cup of coffee with little to no effort. However, us caution when pouring as the cap tends to pop open during pouring hot coffee. My advice is to keep one hand on the lid top to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 Months - Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I have had Farberware percolators for years and have been very satisfied. My last one, identical to this one started shorting out within a year or so. I thought it was a fluke, so I just bought another one this past June....three months ago. Today I noticed the base has a visible electric wire that has gotten so hot it has burned through the plastic. Too dangerous to continue using.
customer_reviews.author: S. Boatright

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed Farberware percolator coffee for years. Out of the box, the heating element wasn't working. It brewed warm brown water. Extremely disappointed. For the money, will need to consider buying something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My mother-in-law had one just like this for years and when it broke she was ...
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law had one just like this for years and when it broke she was devastated. I bought this for her for Mother's Day and she uses it twice a day...Perfect coffee......everytime!!!
customer_reviews.author: Felice Mirsky

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Makes coffee so weak it is useless out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: In ordered this because my last one lasted 25 years I got it for my wedding and the coffe stays hot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this percolator as a gift for my daughter. She loves it. She said it makes really good coffee, and makes it fast. Plus, it's very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: dalesmom

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite percolator. I’ve tried others, nothing compares.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i really enjoy my coffee. I enjoy that it is very hot and not warm when serving.
customer_reviews.author: Aracelli

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like a percolator for really good coffee. Hot and strong!
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months stop working and was not able to get an exchange
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and makes a great pot of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Have had many percolators over the years and always go back to Farberware. Reliable and makes a great pot of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Tedk0928

customer_reviews.title: Beware of used
customer_reviews.text: Beware of used. I ordered a coffee pot and it was not clean, spotty on outside and tarnished. Not sure I want to keep it. Very disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Farberware and seller Sterling Silver would not honor warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! This coffee maker broke after just a few months of service. Neither Farberware or the seller, Sterling Silver would honor the warranty! There is a problem with the heating mechanism with this design, it is a safety hazard!
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH MULLIGAN

customer_reviews.title: farberware perculator eléctrico is by far the most best tasteing coffe ever
customer_reviews.text: havent has one sinceramente the 70's ..farberware perculator eléctrico is by far the most best tasteing coffe ever.so happy still around thanks si very much.Will not use my Iturralde coffee makers .they would not ever compare to the 12 cup farberware
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the coffee however the cord could be a foot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not like the pitcure
customer_reviews.text: I love the coffee pot however, it appears in the picture to be a bit stout and it actually is tall and slender.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mancini

customer_reviews.title: Nostaglia
customer_reviews.text: I've used this model and brand of product for fifty years. Utterly reliable and still makes the best cup of Joe to be had. This is the way ALL American products used to be. Who knows where it's made now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The lid prongs were stuck under the top lip of the pot.
customer_reviews.text: When this pot arrived, I struggled to get the lid off. The next time, it took tools to get it off, after which we switched to the lid from our previous Farberware pot, which did not get stuck and still allowed the lid to hold the basket in place.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Makes great coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our 8 cup percolator after the heating element died following many years of use. Very consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Fasy

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee ever
customer_reviews.text: Percolator coffee is the best and the Farberware coffeemaker makes it nearly as fast as a drip coffee maker. I have used these coffeemakers for over 40 years. Have to replace them when the warming unit dies, but that usually takes several years. Will never buy anything else!
customer_reviews.author: LEH

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after 2 months stay away
customer_reviews.text: worked great for about 2 months. coffee was piping hot. After 2 months the coffee is hot but not perk hot. defective. too late to return or exchange. do not buy this coffee maker. i should have believed the reviewers that were saying it stops working. stuck with a 80 dollar farberware.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't perk long enough
customer_reviews.text: Too late to return, but I think the thermostat on this coffee pot is defective. A full pot of water only perks for about 7 minutes. I believe it should perk for at least 14 minutes. Coffee is very, very weak. I'm disappointed, since the last Faberware coffee pot that I bought was great and lasted for about 15 years!
customer_reviews.author: Maurmac

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in the beginning. Coffee was piping hot and tasty. Less than 4 months later and I'm having to microwave the coffee because it's not hot enough. Made a big pot and it came out weak ( and that was with double the coffee ). I've bought these same models for years and they have lasted for years. It's quite obvious that they are using inferior parts in these percolators. This is NOT what I paid for and it was not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Klaw

customer_reviews.title: Makes great coffee.
customer_reviews.text: I always had a drip coffee maker but don't like that most are made of plastic. This coffee pot brews the coffee quickly and it tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Kim J. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee in a hurry!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed! Great coffee pot.... But better than that is the vendor sent it earlier than expected after I emailed him. So responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: A good brew!
customer_reviews.text: A Farber Ware pot always makes a great cup of coffee. This 12 cupper is no exception. Just remember to unplug after the last cup to preserve the heating element.
customer_reviews.author: William G.

customer_reviews.title: Makes great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Works great - really hot coffee, I can tell a difference from my other coffee maker
customer_reviews.author: ken jolly

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: wonderful product... Farbeware is the best. Bought this as a gift but my Farberware from 50 years ago is working beautiful and still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: andrea I mccart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love HOT COFFEE, and it does the job. Better than all the others on the market
customer_reviews.author: june gower

customer_reviews.title: Greatest coffee ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, was delivered quickly. Nothing like a Farberware Electric Percolator.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Barry

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made pot
customer_reviews.text: Average percolator and looks cheaply made with ill fitting lid. It does brew the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: capitalcityguy

customer_reviews.title: Old school
customer_reviews.text: A Perfect HOT cup every time. Not just for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Delia Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coffee pot! Easy to use, and keeps the coffee hot!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Perkaway..
customer_reviews.text: Farberware percolators have been in my home for many years. They make the perfect cup of coffee, they are easy to clean and they are easily washed. They last for many years and are well made. This last Farberware percolator replaced one that was maybe 15 years old...or more. Farberware percolators are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: You like hot coffee
customer_reviews.text: You like hot coffee? You need this pot. It's not fancy but it's a hot and delicious every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the pot but will wait to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Lindamood

product_meta.title: Farberware FCP412 1000 Watt 12-Cup Percolator, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Rediscover the robust aroma and taste of percolated coffee with the FARBERWARE 2-12 Cup Stainless Steel Percolator. It gets up to 25F hotter than leading drip coffeemakers, taking flavor extraction to the extreme! The automatic keep warm function gently warms coffee after perking, and the detachable cord makes for easy pouring and storage. Stainless Steel Coffee Basket Automatic Keep Warm Detachable Cord Cup-A-Minute 2-12 Cups UL listed. Specifications Capacity: 12 Cups Color: Stainless Steel Cord Storage: Detachable Power Cord Material: Stainless Steel Wattage: 1000.
feature_bullets: Stainless steel body for added durability
Cool-touch handle, lid knob, and base for security
Rolled edges provide easy handling as you pour

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars100 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
